socketedItems.secDescrText: A bloody scythe swipes across a selected area, applying a physical damage over time debuff and hitting enemies with physical damage. If any survive, you gain a blood charge which raises the damage and cost of the skill. Players can have 5 maximum blood charges.

Deals 1631.8 Base Physical Damage per second
Base duration is 1.00 seconds

Lose a Blood Charge when an Enemy Dies while affected by this Skill's Debuff

Deals 20% more Damage per Blood Charge

socketedItems.secDescrText: Casting once reserves mana to carry a banner which increases the accuracy of nearby allies, and physical damage taken by nearby enemies. Gain stages by killing enemies while carrying the banner. Casting the skill again places the banner, ending the mana reservation. Once placed, it becomes more powerful for each stage gained. You cannot have multiple banners at the same time.

You and nearby allies gain 21% increased Accuracy Rating
